verbose_text: Proximal / whole-colon SPP-FHP / CRC presented a higher frequency of O-6-methylguanine-DNA methyltransferase (MGMT) methylation / LOH, microsatel-lite instability (MSI) and Wnt mutations (19/29 vs. 7/17; 16/23 vs. 1/14, p = 2.2x10 -4; 15/26 vs. 2/15, p = 0.006; 14/26 vs. 4/20, p = 0.02) but a lower frequency of B-raf proto-oncogene, serine/threonine kinase (BRAF) mutations (7/30 vs. 12/20, p = 0.0089) than the distal form.
